newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Adecco says 1997 H1 net profit up 36 pct.
newsitem.headline: Adecco says 1997 H1 net profit up 36 pct.

text.p: Revenues based on region: France 2,099 vs 1,793

* The company was formed in 1996 from a merger between Swiss Adia and France's Ecco. The company says profit before goodwill amortisation is the most important figure because it reflects the company's ability to finance growth and pay dividends. Note: Full company name is Adecco SA -- Zurich Editorial, +41 1 631 7340
